text.section: In this section, "Committee" means the Pricing and Selection Committee for the Employment Works Program.
There is a Pricing and Selection Committee for the Employment Works Program.

A member of the Committee:
may not receive compensation; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations as provided in the State budget.
